column5: I posted a week or so ago and added some footage of my boy helping clean the catch at the end. my boy Jack loves sitting at the computer watching my videos...he'll come over as soon as i sit at the computer and ask for 'fish?'  while he likes the fishing videos, he has also started to ask to watch..."Jack?" He really loves watching himself on screen, he found it really funny when he says "eeeeew" about kissing the fish we were cleaning....had my wife and me laughing along too...precious moments!  I did a video of the original clip then Jack and mum and dad watching it with him...i just love it!   <object width="425" height="344"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yiaRZCkiE70?hl=en&fs=1"></param><param'>http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yiaRZCkiE70?hl=en&fs=1"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yiaRZCkiE70?hl=en&fs=1" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" allowscriptaccess="always" allowfullscreen="true" width="425" height="344"></embed></object>
Thanks for sharing Simon... needed a few smiles tonight!
Wayne....you deserve a good smile with all thats on your plate, i'm sure your loved one will pull through...she's a tough cookie that one
Thanks Simon... these videos of yours bring back so many memories and smiles. Both our girls where right there with their noses in cleaning a fish or two at the end of the day for midnight snack.
That's just adorable.  You is a lucky man, your wife too.  Well done.
